Description: Irregular fragment of linen cloth of medium - coarse quality; undecorated, colour now yellow-tan (possibly due to yellow ochre pigment). One plain selvedge; other edges ragged or torn. The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.14 ends per 10mm and weft c.8 picks per 10mm.
